user.class.php

00001 <?php
00002 
00003 /**
00004  * Contains all interaction related to users.
00005  *
00006  * @author Ryan LeFevre
00007  */
00008 class OsimoUser {
00009  public $id, $username, $email, $time_format;
00010  private $is_guest, $ip_address;
00011 
00012  /**
00013   * Class constructor.
00014   *
00015   * @param mixed $id        (optional)
00016   *  If false, the system tries to load the user from session variables. Otherwise,
00017   *  the system will load the user with the ID specified.
00018   * @param boolean $is_viewer (optional)
00019   *  Is the user this class is loading the actual user that is browsing the forum?
00020   */
00021  function OsimoUser($id=false, $is_viewer=true) {
00022   get('debug')->register('OsimoUser', array(
00023     'events'=>false,
00024     'benchmarking'=>false
00025    ));
00026 
00027   if ($id && !is_numeric($id)) {
00028    get("debug")->error("OsimoUser: invalid user ID specified", true);
00029    return false;
00030   }
00031 
00032   if (!$is_viewer) {
00033    $this->loadBasicInfo($id);
00034    return true;
00035   }
00036 
00037   if (isset($_SESSION['user']) && ($id==false || $_SESSION['user']['id']==$id)) {
00038    $this->loadFromSession();
00039    $this->is_guest = 0;
00040   }
00041   elseif (isset($_SESSION['user'])) {
00042    $this->loadFromDB($id);
00043    $this->is_guest = 0;
00044   }
00045   else {
00046    $this->loadAsGuest();
00047   }
00048 
00049   $this->init();
00050  }
00051 
00052  private function loadFromSession() {
00053   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoUser', 'events', 'Loading user from saved session.');
00054   foreach ($_SESSION['user'] as $key=>$val) {
00055    $this->$key = $val;
00056   }
00057  }
00058 
00059  private function loadFromDB($id) {
00060   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoUser', 'events', 'Loading user from database.');
00061   $user = get("db")->select('id,username,email,ip_address,time_format')->from('users')->where('id=%d', $id)->row(true, 300);
00062   foreach ($user as $key=>$val) {
00063    $this->$key = $val;
00064   }
00065  }
00066 
00067  private function loadAsGuest() {
00068   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoUser', 'events', 'Setting user as guest.');
00069   $this->id = 0;
00070   $this->username = 'Guest';
00071   $this->email = false;
00072   $this->is_guest = true;
00073   $this->ip_address = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'];
00074   $this->time_format = 'M j, Y';
00075  }
00076 
00077  private function loadBasicInfo($id) {
00078   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoUser', 'events', 'Loading information for user ID #'.$id);
00079   $loadInfo = array(
00080    'id', 'username',
00081    'email', 'ip_address',
00082    'signature', 'posts',
00083    'is_admin', 'is_global_mod',
00084    'time_joined'
00085   );
00086   $user = get('db')->select($loadInfo)->from('users')->where('id=%d', $id)->row(true, 86400);
00087   foreach ($user as $key=>$val) {
00088    $this->$key = $val;
00089   }
00090 
00091   $this->time_joined = date(get('user')->time_format, strtotime($this->time_joined));
00092  }
00093 
00094  private function init() {
00095   if (!$this->ip_check()) {
00096    return false;
00097   }
00098  }
00099 
00100  private function ip_check() {
00101   if ($this->is_guest) { return true; }
00102   if ($this->ip_address != $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']) {
00103    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoUsers', 'events', 'User logging in from new IP, updating database...');
00104    get('db')->update('users')
00105    ->set(array('ip_address'=>"'".$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']."'"))
00106    ->where('id=%d', $this->id)
00107    ->limit(1)
00108    ->update();
00109   }
00110 
00111   return true;
00112  }
00113 
00114  /**
00115   * Updates the database with the user's latest
00116   * visit time and visit location.
00117   *
00118   * @return Boolean for the success of the update.
00119   */
00120  public function update_user_stats() {
00121   if ($this->is_guest) {
00122    return true;
00123   }
00124 
00125   $last_page = get('paths')->getCurrentPage();
00126   $last_visit = get('db')->formatDateForDB();
00127   $page_type = get('theme')->page_type;
00128 
00129   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoUser', 'events', "Updating user browsing information. Page: $last_page, page type: $page_type, visit time: $last_visit");
00130 
00131   $result = get('db')->update('users')
00132   ->set(array(
00133     'last_page'=>"'$last_page'",
00134     'last_page_type'=>"'$page_type'",
00135     'time_last_visit'=>"'$last_visit'"
00136    ))
00137   ->where('id=%d', $this->id)
00138   ->limit(1)
00139   ->update();
00140 
00141   if ($result) { return true; }
00142   return false;
00143  }
00144 
00145  /**
00146   * Increases this user's post count by one in the database.
00147   *
00148   * @return Boolean result of the database update.
00149   */
00150  public function increase_post_count() {
00151   $result = get('db')->update('users')->set(array('posts'=>'posts+1'))->where('id=%d', $this->id)->limit(1)->update();
00152   if ($result) { return true; }
00153   return false;
00154  }
00155 
00156  /**
00157   * Retrieves the URL to this user's avatar.
00158   *
00159   * @return The link to the avatar.
00160   */
00161  public function avatar() {
00162   if (file_exists(ABS_AVATARS.$this->id.'.png')) {
00163    return URL_AVATARS.$this->id.'.png';
00164   }
00165   elseif (file_exists(ABS_AVATARS.$this->id.'.jpg')) {
00166    return URL_AVATARS.$this->id.'.jpg';
00167   }
00168   elseif (file_exists(ABS_AVATARS.$this->id.'.gif')) {
00169    return URL_AVATARS.$this->id.'.gif';
00170   }
00171   else {
00172    return URL_AVATARS.'noavatar.jpg';
00173   }
00174  }
00175 
00176  /**
00177   * Generates a link to this user's profile page.
00178   *
00179   * @return A link to the user's profile.
00180   */
00181  public function profile_link() {
00182   /* This will automatically format for classes/groups later */
00183   return '<a href="'.SITE_URL.'profile.php?id='.$this->id.'">'.$this->username.'</a>';
00184  }
00185 
00186  /**
00187   * Generates a link to any user's profile page.
00188   *
00189   * @param int $id
00190   *  The ID of the user whose profile you want to link to.
00191   * @param String $username
00192   *  The username of the user whose profile you want to link to.
00193   * @return A link to the user's profile.
00194   */
00195  public static function get_profile_link($id, $username) {
00196   return '<a href="'.SITE_URL.'profile.php?id='.$id.'">'.$username.'</a>';
00197  }
00198 
00199  /**
00200   * Is this user logged in?
00201   *
00202   * @return Boolean representing if the user is logged in or not.
00203   */
00204  public function is_logged_in() {
00205   return $this->id != 0;
00206  }
00207 
00208  /**
00209   * Formats a date based on this user's preferences.
00210   *
00211   * @param mixed $date
00212   *  Can be in timestamp or already formatted date format.
00213   * @param boolean $inc_time (optional)
00214   *  Should the returned date include the time as well?
00215   * @return The newly formatted date.
00216   */
00217  public function date_format($date, $inc_time=false) {
00218   if (!is_numeric($date)) { $date = strtotime($date); }
00219   if ($inc_time) { return date($this->time_format.' g:ia', $date); }
00220   else { return date($this->time_format, $date); }
00221  }
00222 }
